579920.name: Swatcher
579920.description:
Swatcher is a color palette creation tool with a variety of features to streamline, organize and automate the process for you.

Swatcher allows you to:

  • Use a variety of options and settings to quickly generate different color harmonies and shades
  • Rapidly design and organize your project's color schemes
  • Ctrl+click any saved color to copy it's hex code to the clipboard
  • Quickly convert between hex codes, rgb, hsv, and cmyk
  • Save and load your color project in an easily-editable JSON file
